description: This file defines a Redux slice named 'user' for managing user state, including user info and goals, using Redux Toolkit's createSlice.

methods.name: setUser
methods.description: Reducer to update user information in the state with provided payload.

methods.name: updateGoals
methods.description: Reducer to update user goals in the state with provided payload.

ctags.name: avatar
ctags.pattern: /^const initial = { id: "demo", name: "Demo User", avatar: "", goals: { steps: 8000 } };$/
